meta.name: Automate HR Candidate Shortlisting with Sheets, Gmail, ClickUp & Calendly

parameters.message:
=Hii {{ $json.Name }}!

Congratulations for moving forward.
Please book your calendly time slot.
https://calendly.com/anuj-techdome/30min
parameters.subject: =Congratulations! {{ $json.Name }} for moving forward

parameters.content:
## üöÄ START PROCESS

**Start Auto Candidate Shortlisting**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Manually initiate the automated candidate progression workflow
‚Ä¢ **Trigger**: Click to start processing all candidates in the database
‚Ä¢ **Process**: Begins sequential evaluation of candidate scores
‚Ä¢ **Timing**: Run after new evaluation scores are added to the system
‚Ä¢ **Best Practice**: Execute during business hours for immediate follow-up

## üìä DATA RETRIEVAL

**Fetch All Candidate Records**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Retrieves complete candidate database from Google Sheets
‚Ä¢ **Source**: 'Resume store' spreadsheet, Sheet2
‚Ä¢ **Data Retrieved**: Names, scores, contact info, and evaluation summaries
‚Ä¢ **Processing**: Loads all rows for batch analysis
‚Ä¢ **Output**: Array of candidate objects with all profile information
‚Ä¢ **Performance**: Handles large candidate databases efficiently

## üîç QUALIFICATION FILTER

**Filter High-Score Candidates**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Identifies candidates who meet minimum qualification threshold
‚Ä¢ **Criteria**: Score > 70 points (indicating good fit or better)
‚Ä¢ **Logic**: Filters out candidates with moderate or poor fit scores
‚Ä¢ **Output**: Only qualified candidates proceed to next stage
‚Ä¢ **Customization**: Threshold can be adjusted based on role requirements
‚Ä¢ **Quality Control**: Ensures only viable candidates advance in process

## üìß CANDIDATE NOTIFICATION

**Send Congratulations Email**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Automatically notifies qualified candidates of their progress
‚Ä¢ **Recipient**: Uses candidate's email from database
‚Ä¢ **Content**: Personalized congratulatory message with next steps
‚Ä¢ **Scheduling Link**: Includes Calendly link for interview booking
‚Ä¢ **Personalization**: Dynamic insertion of candidate name
‚Ä¢ **Professional Touch**: Maintains positive candidate experience

## üìã TASK MANAGEMENT

**Create Screening Task in ClickUp**

‚Ä¢ **Purpose**: Automatically creates screening tasks for HR team
‚Ä¢ **Task Details**: 
  - Title: 'Screening [Candidate Name] TO BE DONE'
  - Assigned to specific team member (ID: 95074494)
  - Organized in designated project structure
‚Ä¢ **Workflow Integration**: Links hiring process to project management
‚Ä¢ **Accountability**: Ensures follow-up actions are tracked and assigned
‚Ä¢ **Efficiency**: Eliminates manual task creation for each qualified candidate

## üéØ AUTO SHORTLIST & STAGE MOVEMENT WORKFLOW

**üöÄ Purpose:** Streamlines the hiring process by automatically advancing qualified candidates and coordinating follow-up actions

**üîÑ Workflow Process:**
1. **Data Collection**: Retrieve all candidate profiles and scores from database
2. **Smart Filtering**: Identify candidates with scores above qualification threshold (>70)
3. **Candidate Communication**: Send personalized advancement notifications with interview scheduling
4. **Task Automation**: Create screening tasks in project management system for HR team

**üìà Scoring Thresholds:**
‚Ä¢ **>70 Points**: Qualified candidates advance to interview stage
‚Ä¢ **‚â§70 Points**: Candidates remain in current stage for review

**‚ú® Key Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ **Speed**: Immediate candidate progression without manual intervention
‚Ä¢ **Consistency**: Standardized advancement criteria and communications
‚Ä¢ **Organization**: Automated task creation ensures nothing falls through cracks
‚Ä¢ **Experience**: Professional, timely communication enhances candidate journey
‚Ä¢ **Efficiency**: Reduces manual work for HR teams

**üìä Integration Points:**
‚Ä¢ Google Sheets (candidate database)
‚Ä¢ Gmail (candidate communications) 
‚Ä¢ ClickUp (task management)
‚Ä¢ Calendly (interview scheduling)

## ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURATION SETTINGS

**üîß Customizable Parameters:**

**Score Threshold**: Currently set to 70
‚Ä¢ Adjust based on role competitiveness
‚Ä¢ Higher thresholds for senior positions
‚Ä¢ Lower thresholds for entry-level roles

**Email Template**: Personalized messaging
‚Ä¢ Subject: Congratulations + candidate name
‚Ä¢ Body: Professional advancement notification
‚Ä¢ CTA: Calendly scheduling link

**ClickUp Integration**:
‚Ä¢ Team ID: 9016683627
‚Ä¢ Space ID: 90162844741  
‚Ä¢ Folder ID: 90164394824
‚Ä¢ List ID: 901610812551
‚Ä¢ Default Assignee: 95074494

**üìù Maintenance Notes:**
‚Ä¢ Update email templates seasonally
‚Ä¢ Review score thresholds monthly
‚Ä¢ Monitor ClickUp task completion rates
‚Ä¢ Ensure Calendly links remain active
